title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the view's maximized state is lost. Specifically, when opening the CVS repository view in the Java perspective, maximizing it by double-clicking the title bar, and then switching to the resource perspective and back to the Java perspective, the view is no longer maximized.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double click the title bar to maximize the view.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Switch back to the Java perspective and observe that the view is no longer maximized.
